person.persName: John Middleton Hewett (Jefferson County, Kentucky, photographer and U.S. Army captain)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, photographer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Ruth Potter Hewett in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 9, 1839. Father of Marian Hewett, Alfred B. Hewett, and Ellen Hewett. Daguerreotypist in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Ambrotypist in Louisville in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as a captain from October 8, 1861, to November 16, 1864. Captured at Murfreesboro, Tennessee, on July 13, 1862. Prisoner of war at Richmond, Virginia, on October 11, 1862. Paroled at Aiken's Landing, Virginia, on October 12, 1862.
